title: Group portrait from left, front row: Morris Hill, Alberta Thompson, Arnold "Arnie" Sowell, Barbara Robinson, and Reubin Kurby; second row: Mary Bean, Eleanor Bean, Arlene Prundty, "Pat" Doe, La Doris McClaney, Mary Cummings, Vurnetta Bradley, and Patricia "Pat" Prattis (Jennings); standing: Vera Thompson (Matthews), Edward Fleming, Maurice Stokes, Charles Hefflin, Stanley Bethel Friday, Curtis Ross, Horace Hord, Bill "Sy" Green, Seth Sneed, and Robert Fredrick, posed in McClaney home for party at 616 Wilkinsburg Avenue
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
